text: Ne nibasomelwa tsinyaali tsiefu tsili habulafu , olalola obweni bwabakhayi 22. nibwechesia obusinyifu. Bakhaba ahambi okhutsunushila balia ababasomelanga tsinyali tsiefu etso. Koo! ebaboolelekho amabii muno okhushila ako? Ni omulilo ,Nyasaye yarecheshela balia abakhaya, ne ni amakalushilo amabii muno
